title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
description: When creating a chart and selecting a column without data, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
OB: No observed behavior mentioned in the bug report.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should appear to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
 1. Create a chart. 
 2. Set the data definition. 
 3. Select a column without any data.
